description:
After talking to Ritsu about the truth of their world, Aria and Shogo ask him to lend them his aid. Later Shinohara Mifue and Morita Naruko, who also started to notice the incongruities in their world like Ritsu, visit the music prep room as well.
While others are talking about people being "spirited away" on the gossiper, Tomoe Kotaru dashes into the room claiming he can no longer reach his friend who went into the library...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ceux qui ne s`acceptent pas ne seront pas respectés
Jibun no Sonzai o Mitomenai Ningen wa, Tanin kara mo Sonkeisarenai.
People Who Do Not Respect Themselves Will Not Be Respected by Others.
自分の存在を認めない人間は, 他人からも尊敬されない.
